name: Avikshith Yelakonda
title: Data Scientist | ML/AI Professional
bio: Specialized in building end-to-end data products, from ingestion and modeling to deployment and dashboards. Focused on reliability, scalability, and measurable outcomes that drive smarter decisions.

projects.name: Consumer Affairs Lead Conversion Case Study
projects.description: Built a predictive modeling pipeline using Logistic Regression and XGBoost, achieving ROC-AUC ≈ 0.68 and 2.3–2.4× lift in top-decile leads. Shipped Power BI dashboards for stakeholders.

projects.name: AI Assignments - Intelligent Agent Systems
projects.description: Designed AI agents for search and optimization (maze, n-Queens, Connect-4) using BFS/DFS/A*, Hill-Climbing, Simulated Annealing, and Minimax+Alpha-Beta algorithms.

projects.name: University Course Teaching Assistant RAG
projects.description: Built a multi-tenant RAG teaching assistant where professors upload course PDFs/PPTX and students get grounded Q&A scoped to their professor and course.
projects.results: Deployed RAG system for academic support

projects.name: ML Assignments - Predictive Modeling and Neural Nets
projects.description: Compared supervised learners (LogReg, PCA+MLP, CNN, Wide and Deep). Tuned optimizers and evaluated across datasets.
projects.results: Comprehensive ML model comparison and evaluation

projects.name: Revenue Growth Campaign Optimization
projects.description: Designed A/B tests, analyzed KPIs, and improved marketing ROI by 22% with budget allocation recommendations.

projects.name: Stock Price Time-Series Forecasting
projects.description: Forecasted Shopify and Alibaba stock prices using ARIMA and exponential smoothing to support investor risk profiling.

projects.name: NYC Taxi Demand Forecasting
projects.description: Predicted hourly demand with 92%+ accuracy using weather and trip features with tuned models for planning.

projects.name: Vendor Sales and Inventory Optimization
projects.description: Reduced holding cost by 72% and optimized $2.7M unsold stock through Power BI dashboards and analytics.
projects.results: 72% reduction in holding costs, optimized $2.7M inventory

experience.title: Data Scientist
experience.description: Building and evaluating machine learning models for business use cases. Deploying production-ready data pipelines and dashboards. Partnering with product and business teams to define KPIs and run experiments. Designing and automating ETL workflows using Python, SQL, and Airflow. Implementing MLOps pipelines for versioning and reproducibility using MLflow and Docker.

experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: Partnered with cross-functional teams across finance, healthcare, media, and retail to deliver data-driven insights. Developed and maintained ETL/ELT pipelines using dbt and Airflow on Snowflake. Built interactive Power BI and Tableau dashboards for KPI tracking. Engineered and tuned ML models for churn and demand forecasting. Processed large datasets using Databricks and PySpark. Deployed workflows with MLflow and Docker.

experience.title: Cox Copy Center - Support (Part-time)
experience.description: Maintained secure access to confidential materials. Handled high-volume print/copy requests under tight deadlines. Provided real-time staff support in fast-paced academic environment. Assisted with building security procedures and safe closing operations.

experience.title: Student Ambassador - RLSH (Part-time)
experience.description: Front-desk representative supporting student engagement and housing operations. Maintained accurate housing records and ensured policy clarity. Resolved routine and urgent concerns with confidentiality. Led engagement initiatives to improve residential experience. Served as interim Program Coordinator for Dorm Leadership Team.
